Class Book

  • java.lang.Object
    • LibResource
      • Book
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EBook, PrintBook
    public class Book
extends LibResource
    Superclass for all book resources.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Meenah the Fish

    • Constructor Detail

      • Book

        public Book()
        Constructor for objects of class LibResource.

      • Book

        public Book​(String author,
            String title,
            String publisher,
            int yearPublished,
            String location,
            long resourceId)
        Constructor for objects of class LibResource that takes in parameters. The userAccessing parameter is always initialised as 'null'. The isEresource parameter is initialised as 'false' and then changed by the subclasses.
        Parameters:
        author - The resource's author.
        title - The resource's title.
        publisher - The resource's publisher.
        isEresource - Indicates whether it is an online resource (true) or in print (false).
        yearPublished - The year of publication.
        isAvailable - Whether the resource is available (true) or on loan (false).
        location - The location of the resource.

      • setIfEresource

        public void setIfEresource​(boolean isEresource)
        Method to set whether the resource is online or not (not for devices!).
        Parameters:
        isEresource - True if it is an online resource, false if it's in print.

      • checkIfEResource

        public boolean checkIfEResource()
        Method to check book is in print or online.
        Returns:
        isEresource Whether the resource is online (true) or in print (false).

      • setYearPublished

        public void setYearPublished​(int yearPublished)
        Method to set year of publication.
        Parameters:
        yearPublished - An int with four digits.
